title: SECI to issue up to 20 GW of green energy tenders in FY25
description: The Solar Energy Corporation of India planned to auction up to 20 GW of renewable energy capacity in the current fiscal year. This move was part of the country's strategy to achieve 500 GW of renewable energy by 2030. Last year witnessed the auctioning of over 50 GW, slightly above the set goal.
